recipesJson.name: Mangolorian
recipesJson.author: Sublimeice
recipesJson.description:
A simple mango, peach and cream flavor

Cream Base

Whipped Cream TFA - Adds a nice creamy texture and some slight slight dairy notes
Sweet Cream TFA - This really adds the dairy notes to the liquid. Probably one of my favorite cream flavors
Marshmallow TFA - Gives it that nice thick mouthfeel

Fruit Notes

Juicy Peach CAP & White Peach FA - Gives it that nice peachy flavor while remaining nice and juicy/wet feeling

Mango TFA - Gives it that nice deep natural mango. Almost adds a nectar-ness to the e-liquid
